src:
Hasil Liga Champions Tadi Malam: Barca & Chelsea Gagal Menang di Kandang
06 Nov 2019, 11:02 by Anggi Tiar


Hasil Liga Champions Tadi Malam: Barca & Chelsea Gagal Menang di Kandang

KBRN, Jakarta : Sebanyak delapan pertandingan Liga Champions 2019/2020 pekan keempat telah digelar pada Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari tadi. Hasilnya, dua pertandingan yang melibatkan klub raksasa yakni, Barcelona dan Chelsea menjadi pusat perhatian di matchday kali ini. Ya, Barca maupun Chelsea gagal meraih kemenangan pada laga kali. Meski bermain di kandang sendiri, Barca dan Chelsea hanya mampu meraih satu poin usai bermain imbang menghadapi lawan-lawannya. Diluar dugaan Barca ditahan imbang oleh Slavia Praha. Dalam laga yang berlangsung di Camp Nou Stadium, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari tadi, tuan rumah tak berkutik saat ditahan imbang 0-0 oleh Slavia. Akan tetapi, hasil itu tak membuat posisi Barca tergeser dari puncak klasemen Grup F Liga Champions 2019/2020. El Baca masih mengoleksi delapan poin dari empat laga. Diikuti, Dortmund  (7), Inter MIlan (4) dan Slavia (2).Hal serupa juga dialami Chelsea saat menjamu Ajax Amsterdam. Namun bedanya, laga ini diwarnai hujan gol. Ya, tuan rumah sempat teringgal 1-4, sebelum akhirnya The Blues berhasil menyamakan kedudukan menjadi 4-4 setelah dua pemain Ajax terkena kartu merah. Hasil itu membuat Ajax kini memuncaki klasemen Grup H dengan raihan 7 poin, sama dengan Chelsea dan Valencia yang ada di bawahnya. Valencia sendiri mampu menang 4-1 atas Lille dalam laga pekan ini.Pada laga lainnya, pertandingan antara Borussia Dortmund kontra Inter Milan berakhir anti-klimaks. Inter yang mampu unggul 2-0 di babak pertama, harus tertunduk lesu setelah Dortmund sanggup membalikan keadaan menjadi 3-2.Berikut Hasil Lengkap Liga Champions, Rabu (6/11/2019):Grup ELiverpool 2 - 1 GenkNapoli 1 - 1 SalzburgGrup FBarcelona 0 - 0 Slavia PrahaDortmund 3 - 2 Inter MilanGrup GZenit 0 - 2 LeipzigLyon 3 - 1 BenficaGrup HChelsea 4 - 4 AjaxValencia 4 - 1 Lille
text:
Last Night's Champions League Results: Barca & Chelsea Failed to Win at Home
Nov 6 2019, 11:02 by Anggi Tiar


Last Night's Champions League Results: Barca & Chelsea Failed to Win at Home

KBRN, Jakarta: A total of eight 2019/2020 Champions League matches for the fourth week have been held on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early this morning. The result, two games involving giant clubs namely, Barcelona and Chelsea became the center of attention on Matchday this time. Yes, Barca and Chelsea failed to win in the match this time. Despite playing at home, Barca and Chelsea were only able to win one point after a draw against their opponents. Barca allegedly arrested by Slavia Prague. In a match that took place at Camp Nou Stadium on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early this morning, the host did not move when he was held to a 0-0 draw by Slavia. However, the results did not make Barca's position displaced from the top of Group F Champions League 2019/2020. El Baca is still collecting eight points from four matches. Followed, Dortmund (7), Inter MIlan (4) and Slavia (2). Similar things were experienced by Chelsea when entertaining Ajax Amsterdam. But the difference, this fight was colored by a goal rain. Yes, the host had left 1-4, before finally the Blues managed to equalize 4-4 after two Ajax players were hit by red cards. That result makes Ajax now top the Group H standings with 7 points, the same as Chelsea and Valencia underneath. Valencia itself was able to win 4-1 over Lille in this week's match. On another match, the match between Borussia Dortmund against Inter Milan ended in anti-climax. Inter, who were able to lead 2-0 in the first round, had to be lethargic after Dortmund were able to turn things around 3-2. Following the Champions League Complete Results, Wednesday (11/06/2019): ELiverpool Group 2 - 1 GenkNapoli 1 - 1 Salzburg Group FBarcelona 0 - 0 Slavic PragueDortmund 3 - 2 Inter Milan GZenit Group 0 - 2 LeipzigLyon 3 - 1 BenficaGroup HChelsea 4 - 4 AjaxValencia 4 - 1 Lille
